name: The Big Below
description:
Take on the role of a little gnome exploring the vast caves under the earth. Fight monsters, solve puzzles, and explore labyrinthine dungeons.

Explore four hand-crafted levels, sprawling and nonlinear, as you make your way down the levels to the bottom of the dungeon. Each level has its own visuals, monsters and traps, so stay on your toes!

Secrets await you within. The more you find, the more powerful you may become.

All this awaits you in THE BIG BELOW.
